synopsis.text:
Dog gy Dilemmas and Festival Frights! Dive into the unseen adventures of "My Life as Inukai-san's Dog" with these special episodes! First up, it's a pool party with a twist as Pochita and pals make a splash at the dog pool. But when Karen Inukai's weight worries surface, will the fun turn into a watery worry?

Next, it's time for the school festival! With Karen finally off duty from the dog maid caf√©, she's ready for a fun-filled date with Pochita. However, their day takes an unexpected turn when rival Usagi Tsukishiro joins in, leading them to a terrifying haunted house. Can Pochita save the day and soothe the scared girls? Find out in these tail-wagging tales that will leave you howling for more!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
